location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Muscat to George Andrew Atkinson

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Atkinson's recovering health at Bassidore and Pelly's intention to remain at Bushire until the mail steamer arrives before heading to Shiraz.The letter also discusses the possibility of the British occupying Augam [Henjam]; the question of whether or not a Sepoy guard is required; the situation in Muscat and the British response to Syed Torkee [Turki bin Said]'s actions.
